```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)

Strandings <- read.csv("../MezaFidalgo_Ozog_Pepper_ENV872_EDA_FinalProject/Data/Raw/OBIS_seamap_strandings_mystic.csv", stringsAsFactors = TRUE)

Strandings_Parsed <- Strandings %>%
  select(common_name, species_name, date_time, latitude, longitude)

Strandings_Clean <- Strandings_Parsed %>%
  separate(Strandings_Parsed, date_time, c("Date","Time", sep = " " ))
```
